[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@thirdweb-dev/sdk](./sdk.md) &gt; [EditionDrop](./sdk.editiondrop.md)

## EditionDrop class

Setup a collection of NFTs with a customizable number of each NFT that are minted as users claim them.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare class EditionDrop extends Erc1155<DropERC1155> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Erc1155&lt;DropERC1155&gt;

## Example


```javascript
import { ThirdwebSDK } from "@thirdweb-dev/sdk";

// You can switch out this provider with any wallet or provider setup you like.
const provider = ethers.Wallet.createRandom();
const sdk = new ThirdwebSDK(provider);
const editionDrop = sdk.getEditionDrop("{{contract_address}}");
```

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [claim(tokenId, quantity, proofs)](./sdk.editiondrop.claim.md) |  | Claim a token to the connected wallet |
